mapper.update: UPDATE cmcsniphyconfig SET topCcmtsSniInt=#{topCcmtsSniInt} WHERE cmcId = #{cmcId} AND phyIndex = #{phyIndex}
mapper.select: select cmcId from cmcsniphyconfig where cmcId=#{cmcId} AND phyIndex=#{phyIndex}
mapper.update: Update cmcsniphyconfig set topCcmtsSniInt = #{topCcmtsSniInt}, topCcmtsSniCurrentMedia = #{topCcmtsSniCurrentMedia}, topCcmtsSniDuplexMod = #{topCcmtsSniDuplexMod} where cmcId = #{cmcId} AND phyIndex = #{phyIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcsniphyconfig (cmcId, phyIndex, topCcmtsSniInt, topCcmtsSniCurrentMedia, topCcmtsSniDuplexMod) VALUES (#{cmcId}, #{phyIndex}, #{topCcmtsSniInt}, #{topCcmtsSniCurrentMedia}, #{topCcmtsSniDuplexMod})
mapper.update: Update cmcsnicpuportratelimit set topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressArp = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressArp}, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUni = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUni}, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUdp = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUdp}, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressDhcp = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressDhcp}, topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIcmp = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIcmp}, topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIgmp = #{topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIgmp}, uplinkIngressBroadcast = #{uplinkIngressBroadcast}, uplinkIngressMulticast = #{uplinkIngressMulticast}, cableIngressBroadcast = #{cableIngressBroadcast}, cableIngressMulticast = #{cableIngressMulticast} where cmcId = #{cmcId}
Update cmcsniconfig set topCcmtsSniUplinkLoopbackStatus = #{topCcmtsSniUplinkLoopbackStatus} where cmcId = #{cmcId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmcsnicpuportratelimit (cmcId, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressArp, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUni, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUdp, topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressDhcp, topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIcmp, topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIgmp, uplinkIngressBroadcast, uplinkIngressMulticast, cableIngressBroadcast, cableIngressMulticast) VALUES (#{cmcId}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressArp}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUni}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressUdp}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteCpuPortEgressDhcp}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIcmp}, #{topCcmtsRateLimiteUplinkEgressIgmp}, #{uplinkIngressBroadcast}, #{uplinkIngressMulticast}, #{cableIngressBroadcast}, #{cableIngressMulticast})
